message.body: @CrashHD @CrashHD Hello, I see you're new here! If you want to learn how to play, type !help or !commands, you can also read the stream description, but be warned because there is a LOT to read, and feel free to ask any questions if you still have questions. The stream can get quite confusing, so feel free to ask, there are people ready to help you out!

message.body: @FHNN @FHNN Valid inputs are X, Square, O, Triangle, L1, L2, L3, R1, R2, R3, Start, Select (Buttons), Up, Down, Left, Right (Left Analog Stick), Rup, Rdown, Rleft, Rright (Right Analog Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright (D Pad). It's exactly what you'd see if you looked at a PlayStation 2 controller! Typos work too!

fragments.text: @FHNN @FHNN Valid inputs are X, Square, O, Triangle, L1, L2, L3, R1, R2, R3, Start, Select (Buttons), Up, Down, Left, Right (Left Analog Stick), Rup, Rdown, Rleft, Rright (Right Analog Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright (D Pad). It's exactly what you'd see if you looked at a PlayStation 2 controller! Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: X+Up+Rright will press the X Button, pull Up on the Left Analog Stick and pull Right on the Right Analog Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Left Analog Stick.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: X+Up+Rright will press the X Button, pull Up on the Left Analog Stick and pull Right on the Right Analog Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Left Analog Stick.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 8 frames. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 8 frames. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+Square;120 X+O+Down;60 *5 Will pull Up and Right on the Left Analog Stick and press the Square Button for 120 frames, then press the X and O Buttons and pull Down on the Left Analog Stick for 60 frames, and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+Square;120 X+O+Down;60 *5 Will pull Up and Right on the Left Analog Stick and press the Square Button for 120 frames, then press the X and O Buttons and pull Down on the Left Analog Stick for 60 frames, and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: You can use square brackets to make smaller loops. Example: [X+Square;60 O+Triangle;30*4] Start [L1+R1 Up+Left*2] 2 will press X+Square then O+Triangle 4 times, then will press Start, then will press L1+R1 then Up+Left on the Left Analog Stick 2 times, and everything will be repeated 2 times.

fragments.text: You can use square brackets to make smaller loops. Example: [X+Square;60 O+Triangle;30*4] Start [L1+R1 Up+Left*2] 2 will press X+Square then O+Triangle 4 times, then will press Start, then will press L1+R1 then Up+Left on the Left Analog Stick 2 times, and everything will be repeated 2 times.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: X Wait *255 will press the X Button for 8 frames then wait for another 8 frames, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the X Button 255+1 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 64 inputs can be chained in a macro.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: X Wait *255 will press the X Button for 8 frames then wait for another 8 frames, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the X Button 255+1 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 64 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: You can execute commands backwards if you start your message with Invert. Example: Invert Triangle O Square X will execute commands as X Square O Triangle. You can invert directions if you start you message with Opposite. Example: Opposite Up Down Left Right will execute commands as Down Up Right Left.

fragments.text: You can execute commands backwards if you start your message with Invert. Example: Invert Triangle O Square X will execute commands as X Square O Triangle. You can invert directions if you start you message with Opposite. Example: Opposite Up Down Left Right will execute commands as Down Up Right Left.

message.body: You can use both Invert and Opposite at the same time. Example: Opposite Invert X+Up O+Down Square+Left Triangle+Right Select Up Down will execute commands as Up Down Select Triangle+Left Square+Right O+Up X+Down.

fragments.text: You can use both Invert and Opposite at the same time. Example: Opposite Invert X+Up O+Down Square+Left Triangle+Right Select Up Down will execute commands as Up Down Select Triangle+Left Square+Right O+Up X+Down.

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 frames. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 frames. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

message.body: You can learn how to save and execute saved macros (and more!) by using the command !macrohelp. You can also find this help message in the stream description. The framerate is currently 59fps.

fragments.text: You can learn how to save and execute saved macros (and more!) by using the command !macrohelp. You can also find this help message in the stream description. The framerate is currently 59fps.

message.body: @FHNN @FHNN Hello, I see you're new here! If you want to learn how to play, type !help or !commands, you can also read the stream description, but be warned because there is a LOT to read, and feel free to ask any questions if you still have questions. The stream can get quite confusing, so feel free to ask, there are people ready to help you out!

commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 38 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!
